title: Zeitrates of the Geistribbean 8/19: NBA, National Photography Day, Goodyear, Brad Pitt x Jennifer Aniston
itunes:title: Zeitrates of the Geistribbean 8/19: NBA, National Photography Day, Goodyear, Brad Pitt x Jennifer Aniston
description:
On this edition of Zeitrates of the Geistribbean Captain Jack and First Mate Miles discuss the happenings in the NBA Bubble as the Playoffs begin, it's National Photography Day, Goodyear has a no tolerance policy for political wear and now Trump is mad, and Brad Pitt and Jennifer Aniston will be doing a table read together.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
